extendedInfo.description: This free application gives you access to all the gags, jokes, candid camera from Comedy Central. Comedy Central brings you the funniest stuff on the planet. Watch hit shows like Key & Peele, South Park, Tosh.0, The Daily Show with Jon Stewart, The Jeselnik Offensive, Inside Amy Schumer and The Colbert Report, plus cutting-edge stand-up comedy you won't find anywhere else. Head to CC.com for full episodes, highlights, previews and more:- all the videos are properly categorized;- it works on all devices (require video play support);- it works both in landscape or portrait mode;- search feature in each category;- the content is up to date and updates constantly - no dead linksComedy Central is an American basic cable and satellite television channel that is owned by MTV Networks Entertainment Group, a unit of the Viacom Media Networks division of Viacom. The channel carries comedy programming, in the form of both original and syndicated series and stand-up comedy specials, as well as feature films.DISCLAIMER: The videos in this app are neither uploaded nor hosted by us. The videos linked to by this app are available in the public domain and or on YouTube, uploaded by members of the general public. This app is entirely unofficial and unauthorized, and only provides a convenient way of searching and accessing the videos uploaded by others. As the videos linked to by the app are uploaded by others, we cannot be held responsible for the availability of any video. No infringement of copyright or trademark is intended.In case of any problems or suggestions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

reviews.title: Stupid!
reviews.comment: Kept on saying that I didnt have youtube service or something like that. Completely stupid. I have the app right on my phone
reviews.author: Jennifer Greer
